title: Ardcarne Garden Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Salad bar, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has vegan menu choices, including nearly all soups, a few mains such as vegetable curry with rice, ratatouille or Tuscan veg stew, as well as vegan sandwiches, hummus and salads. Located a stoneâ€™s throw from the main Dublin/Sligo Road on the Sligo side of Carrick-on-Shannon. There is ample customer parking. A family-friendly cafe with games and books available. Dogs are welcome as there is an outdoor seating area where you can leave your dog safely tied up within sight, freeing you to come indoors and enjoy the warmth of the wood burning stove and choose a book from the lending library in the cafe.
